press.title: Press
press.bioShort: Bojeng is a [genre] band from [city]. Melodies with bite, lyrics in Swedish, and energy from rehearsal to stage. The debut EP was released in 2025, with follow-up singles during 2026.
press.bioLong: Bojeng blends [influence A], [influence B], and [influence C]. Live it’s tight and intimate — with a focus on dynamics, harmonies, and rhythm. The band has played, among others, [venues/festivals] and is now working on new music together with producer [name].
